meanings: (일하지 않다) idle away, be idle, (informal) loaf around, (실직하다) be out of work[a job], have no job[work], be jobless[unemployed]

examples.korean: Let's make a day of it, you know, pack a picnic lunch, take a blanket, get some sun and fresh air, and enjoy ourselves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 거기 가요. 점심 싸 가지고 담요 가져가서 햇볕도 쬐고 상쾌한 공기도 좀 마시면서 재미있게 놀다 오자구요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
